name: Me, Myself & I
description:
Me, Myself & I

Rewind time to have your past self help you solve puzzles. But beware of time paradoxes! This game is all about timing and planning ahead. Bring Me, Myself & I to their correct exits to complete the levels.

Controls WASDMovementSpaceJumpRReverse time
BRestart the level from the BeginningNumber keys (1-6)Loading / Skipping levelsEscQuit the game Brackeys Game Jam

This game is a submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2, where the theme was REWIND.
You can find the submission page here.

Known Issues
  • If you stand in a doorway while the door closes, you can get stuck. Press B to restart the level.
  • The time paradox detection is based on collisions, which tend to be a bit random. Thus, occasionally, a past self might randomly disappear due to a time paradox, while this should not have happened.
